name: Runic Rampage - Action RPG
description: Play as a raging dwarf and crush your enemies with mighty hammer strikes! Runic Rampage features brutal melee combat, badass bosses and a challenging hunt for the fragments of a legendary rune stone.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista+ Processor: SSE2 instruction set support required (e.g. Core 2 Duo, Athlon X2 or better) Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: OpenGL 3.1 or higher required (Intel HD series, NVIDIA GeForce 8000 series, AMD Radeon HD series or newer) DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 500 MB available space
recommended_requirements: Processor: Quad core processor, Intel Core i5, AMD Athlon X4 or better Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce or AMD Radeon with 512MB VRAM DirectX: Version 11
